El Cheapo raising method
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Raising/Training Methods: El Cheapo raising method
By Cerulean Blade on Tuesday, April 16, 2002 - 03:24 pm:

Strapped for cash? Wondering how you're going to pay for your monsters next meal? Then this is the training method for you!!

Ok, first things first. You must have the Lump of Ice or Fire Stone. Secondly, your monster must like fish (liking tablets would be a boost but the fish is the important one). Thirdly, the basic stats are:

Starts on 3rd week.
Lasts 16 weeks per module.
Consits of 13 LD, 1 HD and 2 Rests.
Costs 2400 G per module.

Still like it? Then away we go...

(Week 3,4,1,2)
LD/LD/Fish/LD/LD (None/None/None/NO)
LD/LD/Tablet/LD/LD (None/ML/NO/None)
LD/Rest/Fish/HD/LD (None/None/None/None)
LD/LD/Tablet/LD/Rest (ML/NO/None/ML)

This will work fine. LI goes to 68 twice, and fatigue goes to 35 at one point. If your monster likes tablets, you can remove the ML from the very last week.

This costs about half of some training methods, just for the record.

Ok, hope you enjoy it...what? I have to do the math? Awwww....

Alright then, bear with me:

Week 3, Month 1: 0,0 (LD) 10,5
Wk 4, Mo 1: 10, 5 (LD) 20, 10

Wk 1, Mo 2: 20, 10 (Fish) 20, 4 (LD) 30, 9
Wk 2, Mo 2: 30, 9 (NO) 2, 9 (LD) 12, 14
Wk 3, Mo 2: 12, 14 (LD) 22, 19
Wk 4, Mo 2: 22, 19 (ML) 22, 10 (LD) 32, 15

Wk 1, Mo 3: 32, 15 (Tablet) 32, 2 (NO) 4, 2 (LD) 14, 7
Wk 2, Mo 3: 14, 7 (LD) 24, 12
Wk 3, Mo 3: 24, 12 (LD) 34, 17
Wk 4, Mo 3: 34, 17 (Rest) 0, 5-8 (It gets confusing from here)

Wk 1, Mo 4: 0, 5-8 (Fish) 0, 0-2 (HD) 15, 12-14
Wk 2, Mo 4: 15, 12-14 (LD) 25, 17-19
Wk 3, Mo 4: 25, 17-19 (ML) 25, 9-10 (LD) 35, 14-15
Wk 4, Mo 4: 35, 14-15 (NO) 7, 14-15 (LD) 17, 19-20

Wk 1, Mo 5: 17, 19-20 (Tablet) 17, 6-7 (LD) 27, 11-12
Wk 2, Mo 5: 27, 11-12 (ML) 27, 6 (Rest) 0,0
Repeat...

Hoipe you find it useful. Before I found this site my monsters rarely made it past 3 yrs. and the highest rank I ever got was 6th. This method got Sylex (Henger/Henger, first-gen) to the 9th rank. Hope you find it useful too. Slan ;)

By Cerulean Blade on Wednesday, April 17, 2002 - 03:19 pm:

Oh yes, I forgot to mention the effect on form and spoil/fear.

In a nutshell, the form will be -5 per module, but Colt's cake (+15 form) should balance it out perfectly by the end of the year. Spoil and fear should both be +7 per module.
